Actions.Name: Run KQL query
Actions.Description: Runs the KQL query and returns the result as a set of rows which can be iterated over in the following connectors e.g TableName | take 10.

Actions.Name: Run show control command
Actions.Description: Runs the show control command and returns the result as a set of rows which can be iterated over in the following connectors e.g .show table TableName policy caching.

Actions.Name: Run async control command
Actions.Description: Runs control command in async mode and returns its ID, state and status on completion. Command can run for maximum 1 hour. The 'async' keyword is mandatory e.g .set-or-append async TargetTable <| SourceTable.

Actions.Name: Run control command and render a chart
Actions.Description: Runs the control command and returns the result as a chart of your choice e.g .clear table TableName data.

Actions.Name: Run KQL query and render a chart
Actions.Description: Runs the KQL query and returns result as a chart of your choice e.g TableName | where Timestamp > ago(1h) | project timestamp, value.
